message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value, I'm proposing a price of $120 for it. This includes not only the product itself but also an exclusive access to future updates and support. I look forward to your consideration.

Hi Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $120 is a bit out of my budget. Given the product is worth $100 to me, I'd be happy to pay $105 for it. This would be a fair price for both of us, allowing me to acquire the product while still ensuring you make a profit. Let me know what you think.
